cards.title: Quality Cleaning
cards.content: Our professional team works hard to provide each and every customer with the very best cleaning service available in the area.

cards.title: Professional Staff
cards.content: We deliver happiness through home, business and commercial cleaning. Our cleaning services come with a satisfaction guarantee.

cards.title: Affordable Rates
cards.content: We offer simple flat rate pricing for home cleaning services based on the size of the home given the number of rooms.

business.name: Evevides Cleaning Services
business.hours:
Monday-Friday: 8:30-5:00 EST
Saturday: 9:00-4:00 EST
Sunday: by appointment ONLY

about.title: About Evevides
about.text: We are a professional team of women offering quality service to meet your needs at the best market price.

service.text: We offer a variety of services and we have flexible appointment availability. Our team is available to talk with customers seven days a week.

about.subtitle: We are a professional team specialized in general maintenance.

services.title: Single and recurring cleanings available!
services.subtitle: Our Expert cleaners will make your home sparkle.

contact.title: We want to hear from you!
contact.subtitle: Give us a call, email us or use our message form

services.title: Carpet Care
services.description: We specialize in the professional cleaning and restoration of a wide range of flooring materials. Our team believes you deserve the very best service, so we go out of our way to deliver exceptional results and a great customer experience. We want to do more than just clean your floors; we want to win your loyalty.

services.title: After Party
services.description: Cleaning up after a big event can be a major undertaking, especially when there\'s food and drink involved. And depending on the extent of the clean-up, you may even have to rent the right equipment to get the job done. Instead of struggling to restore your space to order, consider a better option: our event cleaning services.

services.title: Office Cleaning
services.description: A clean, well-kept office helps employees stay motivated and content. Treat your employees and your business to a spotless interior with comprehensive office cleaning services from us. No matter the size or layout of your company, we can get your office looking its best without disrupting your schedule.

services.title: Move In/Out
services.description: Now that the rooms are empty – or nearly empty – it’s time to get your home or apartment looking even better. Many house or apartment contracts require a "broom-clean." Others require a thorough checklist that covers everything from baseboards to the microwave oven.
